mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM sys_user AS a, report AS b WHERE a.id = b.author_id AND a.STATUS = 1 AND b.dept_id = #{deptId} AND b.r_from_date = #{fromDate} AND b.r_to_date = #{toDate}
SELECT * FROM report_summary where r_from_date= #{fromDate} AND r_to_date = #{toDate}
select count(*) from report_summary where title = #{value}
SELECT * FROM report_summary WHERE YEARWEEK(date_format(r_from_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),1) = YEARWEEK(now(),1) AND YEARWEEK(date_format(r_to_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),1) = YEARWEEK(now(),1)
select * from report_summary where (month(r_from_date)=#{date} or month(r_to_date)=#{date}) and status=1 order by dept_name, r_from_date
